timeline.bodyText: serialVersionUID  should be 1L at first, From the Flink code style.
timeline.author: JingsongLi

replies.bodyText: serialVersionUID is at the 2nd in all other classes, thus in consistent with them.
replies.author: tragicjun

timeline.bodyText: Just TIMESTAMP_WITHOUT_TIME_ZONE? I don't see any proc-time.
timeline.author: JingsongLi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -207,18 +209,35 @@ public StreamExecRank(
 
         AbstractTopNFunction processFunction;
         if (rankStrategy instanceof RankProcessStrategy.AppendFastStrategy) {
-            processFunction =
-                    new AppendOnlyTopNFunction(
-                            minIdleStateRetentionTime,
-                            maxIdleStateRetentionTime,
-                            inputRowTypeInfo,
-                            sortKeyComparator,
-                            sortKeySelector,
-                            rankType,
-                            rankRange,
-                            generateUpdateBefore,
-                            outputRankNumber,
-                            cacheSize);
+            if (sortFields.length == 1
+                    && inputType.getChildren().get(sortFields[0]).getTypeRoot()
+                            == LogicalTypeRoot.TIMESTAMP_WITHOUT_TIME_ZONE
